docs.text: Welcome to LensHub Docs Документация к проекту LensHub Раздел API Бекенд сервиса реализован при помощи программных средств DRF HOST: http://localhost:8000/ Раздел Front Фронтенд сервиса реализован при помощи программных средств Vue.js HOST: http://localhost:8080/
docs.title: Home

docs.text: Бекенд сервиса реализован при помощи программных средств DRF HOST: http://localhost:8000/
docs.title: Раздел API

docs.text: Фронтенд сервиса реализован при помощи программных средств Vue.js HOST: http://localhost:8080/
docs.title: Раздел Front

docs.text: URL : /token/ Method : POST Auth required : NO Permissions required : NO Data : { phone_number, password } Success Responses Code : 200 OK Content : {[]} { "refresh": "eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJ0b2tlbl90eXBlIjoicmVmcmVzaCIsImV4cCI6MTYyNzU5NDgwMSwianRpIjoiZmYwMzUyYmQ2NzcxNDQ3NGFlOTAwYWUwYTc4Y2ExMTMiLCJ1c2VyX2lkIjoxfQ.ozZj64Bz1mI64BDlz-G2axexLkcTfiegiGr4bYoo-XA", "access": "eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJ0b2tlbl90eXBlIjoiYWNjZXNzIiwiZXhwIjoxNjI1MDg5MjAxLCJqdGkiOiI1YzQzZjI0N2E2YmI0N2E0OGNjZGFhYjJiZTRkMzJiMCIsInVzZXJfaWQiOjF9.OW9Zv1pW-EAbtvFpesm1Jna_CfbTHHyy5QBCMtLDVfE" }
docs.title: Sign in

docs.text: URL : /wearings/create Method : POST Auth required : YES Permissions required : IsAuthenticated Data : { lenses, feel } Success Responses Code : 200 OK Content : {[]} { "app_user": 1, "lenses": 1, "feel": "3" }
docs.title: Wearing creating

docs.text: URL : /lenses/:pk Method : GET Auth required : YES Permissions required : IsAuthenticated Data : NO Success Responses Code : 200 OK Content : {[]} { "id": 4, "lenses_manufacturer": { "id": 2, "company_name": "Acuvue", "country": "USA" }, "model_name": "H-Plus", "price_per_package": 4200.0, "amount_in_package": 24, "raiting": null }
docs.title: Lens detail

docs.text: URL : /lenses/all Method : GET Auth required : YES Permissions required : IsAuthenticated Data : NO Success Responses Code : 200 OK Content : {[]} [{ "id": 1, "lenses_manufacturer": { "id": 1, "company_name": "Oko", "country": "Germany" }, "model_name": "Super dry", "price_per_package": 2500.0, "amount_in_package": 30, "raiting": null }, { "id": 2, "lenses_manufacturer": { "id": 1, "company_name": "Oko", "country": "Germany" }, "model_name": "Oasys", "price_per_package": 1600.0, "amount_in_package": 20, "raiting": null }, { "id": 3, "lenses_manufacturer": { "id": 1, "company_name": "Oko", "country": "Germany" }, "model_name": "Base", "price_per_package": 1000.0, "amount_in_package": 30, "raiting": null }]
docs.title: Lense list

docs.text: Code : 200 OK Content : {[]} [{ "id": 1, "lenses_manufacturer": { "id": 1, "company_name": "Oko", "country": "Germany" }, "model_name": "Super dry", "price_per_package": 2500.0, "amount_in_package": 30, "raiting": null }, { "id": 2, "lenses_manufacturer": { "id": 1, "company_name": "Oko", "country": "Germany" }, "model_name": "Oasys", "price_per_package": 1600.0, "amount_in_package": 20, "raiting": null }, { "id": 3, "lenses_manufacturer": { "id": 1, "company_name": "Oko", "country": "Germany" }, "model_name": "Base", "price_per_package": 1000.0, "amount_in_package": 30, "raiting": null }]
docs.title: Success Responses

docs.text: URL : /manufacturers/all Method : GET Auth required : YES Permissions required : IsAuthenticated Data : NO Success Responses Code : 200 OK Content : {[]} [ { "id": 1, "company_name": "Oko", "country": "Germany" }, { "id": 2, "company_name": "Acuvue", "country": "USA" } ]
docs.title: Manufacturer list

docs.text: URL : /auth/users/ Method : POST Auth required : NO Permissions required : NO Data : { phone_number, username, password } Success Responses Code : 200 OK Content : {[]} { "username": "five", "phone_number": "+79895535255", "id": 3 }
docs.title: Registration

docs.text: URL : /wearings/update Method : PUT/PATCH Auth required : YES Permissions required : IsAuthenticated Data : { lenses, feel } Success Responses Code : 200 OK Content : {[]} { "app_user": 1, "lenses": 3, "feel": "2" }
docs.title: Wearing update

docs.text: URL : /auth/users/me/ Method : GET Auth required : YES Permissions required : IsAuthenticated Data : NO Success Responses Code : 200 OK Content : {[]} { "username": "melok", "id": 1, "phone_number": "+79213395322" }
docs.title: User data

docs.text: URL : /wearings/my Method : GET Auth required : YES Permissions required : IsAuthenticated Data : NO Success Responses Code : 200 OK Content : {[]} [{ "id": 2, "app_user": { "username": "melok", "phone_number": "+79213395322", "email": null, "age": null, "city": null }, "lenses": { "id": 1, "lenses_manufacturer": { "id": 1, "company_name": "Oko", "country": "Germany" }, "model_name": "Super dry", "price_per_package": 2500.0, "amount_in_package": 30, "raiting": null }, "feel": "perfect", "date": "2021-06-30" }]
